pages.name: page1
pages.title: What is required of a story

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What requirements have to be fulfilled in order to develop a unique, non-interchangeable story that will involve the audience and motivate them intrinsically?
choices: A company's story is shown with a timeline.
The story reflects the company's DNA.
The story make the company and its goods or services tangible and real.
The story creates an attention-grabbing, distinctive positioning vis-à-vis competitors.
The story should appear objective as far as possible, without major emotions.
The story grips listeners, who ideally will make a positive purchasing decision.
The story will contain as many details as possible so that it can provide as much information as possible.
correctAnswer: The story reflects the company's DNA.
The story make the company and its goods or services tangible and real.
The story creates an attention-grabbing, distinctive positioning vis-à-vis competitors.
The story grips listeners, who ideally will make a positive purchasing decision.
